nodes.text: The Red Hulls was a gang that was active in the galaxy during the Galactic War; they were infamous for being cannibals. The Corellian Run Scoundrels owed the Red Hulls a large debt.
Republic players in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan will be mistaken for the captain of the Red Hulls, while Imperial players will be mistaken for the leader of the Howling Tempest Gang.
